talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you have something to say?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Hehe…*
You seem like a very smart child…*

(She looks at {user_nick} with a vague smile.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Your Fortune$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you. (Something’s off…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
You have bright eyes.
They’re so bright, you can see right through an abyss.
Hehe……*

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’ve never met a fortuneteller before.</html>
<html>Are you a sorceress who reads minds?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Why don’t you come sit and chat with me for a while?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But how can you tell what my fortune is?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
I’m totally ignorant when it comes to magic.
My old age has granted me the ability to read people’s intentions slightly faster, that’s all.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m curious about what will happen in the future.</html>
<html>I want to know how to escape bad luck.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Hehe…*
Why do you think people come to have their fortunes told?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>They have something they want to hear?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Fortune telling is no different from psychological counseling.
When someone tells you about their concerns, you try to empathize
And tell them what they want to hear.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Just tell them that everyone is going to be fine.
But no one wishes for bad luck, do they?
Hehe…*

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay! I’ll be right here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
Excuse me while I go to the restroom.
Can you watch the area while I’m gone?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>An apprentice? That’s not it…!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Amelie$
Huh? Little child.
Where’s Chara and what are you doing in her place?
Oh... You must be her apprentice! I see!
Anyway, this is urgent so listen carefully.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
${user_nick}$
(She’s not listening to a word I’m saying!
Okay, well here goes nothing...
Just sit here until Chara returns...!)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>This is a great day for romance. Confess your love to somebody.</FONT></html>
<html><FONT color=#a82424>Away with delusions! Don’t mistake someone’s kindness for something else.</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Amelie$
As you can tell, I’m a long-ranged striker, right??
A warrior in my team told me he would teach me how to use a sword in case of an emergency
but he was sneaky and tried to hold my hand.
Seriously? How dare he! Does he like me?
Is that what it is? Is this a sign to make a move? Huh? Huh?

$Sorceress Amelie$
Do you know anything about love?
You look like you haven’t gone on a single date in your entire life!

(Amelie walks away with an irritated expression.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>Your lucky color is blue and your lucky animal is a raven.</FONT></html>
<html><FONT color=#a82424>This is a bad day for money. Protect your pockets.</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Amelie$
Which faction do you think will win this Combat Tournament?
I’m just going to bet once and that’s it for me!
This is my entire life savings. I’ll hunt you down if you’re wrong!

$Sorceress Amelie$
All I asked for was the name of the faction. What’s with the nagging?
Are you my mom? My dad? My teacher?!

(Amelie walks away with an irritated expression.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The energy of <FONT color=#086171>water</FONT> lies inside you. <FONT color=#086171>Fish cutlets</FONT>.</html>
<html>The energy of <FONT color=#a82424>fire</FONT> lies inside you. <FONT color=#a82424>Grilled meat</FONT>.</html>
<html>Spicy rice cakes make the best lunch.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Amelie$
Guess what I ate for lunch today?
What? You don’t know? How is this hard? Isn’t there supposed to be a ghost telling you everything?
*Sigh* I’ll give you a few choices.

Fish cutlets vs Grilled meat

$Sorceress Amelie$
I ate spicy rice cakes, okay?
I thought you’re supposed to be good! You’re just a scam!

(Amelie walks away with an irritated expression.)

$Sorceress Amelie$
You’re just as the rumors say!
I’ll make sure to come back. This is for your services!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don’t worry. You got through it just fine.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Fortuneteller Chara$
There was a customer while I was gone? I thought I was being quick.
Sorry about that...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Quest Completed)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Fortuneteller Chara$
You can keep that for your trouble.
I heard Palace Attendant Jeokwolyang likes the item inside there.
Go and take it to her. Hehe…*

※ [Your Fortune] is a daily quest that can be completed once a day.

journal.title: Smart Child
journal.contents:
I sense an old woman watching me as soon as I enter the streets of Red Lotus Palace. What does she want?

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Fortuneteller Chara

journal.title: Guess My Luck
journal.contents:
As soon as Chara left, a customer appeared. She completely ignored me when I explained I wasn’t her apprentice, and just started telling me her story...

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Sorceress Amelie
journal.todo_msg: There’s a customer who wants their fortune told.

journal.title: Accidental Prodigy
journal.contents:
You told herfortune at whim and were fortunate enough to avoid trouble. Let’s talk to Fortuneteller Chara.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Fortuneteller Chara
